name: Graves
title: the Outlaw
shortBio: Malcolm Graves is a renowned mercenary, gambler, and thief—a wanted man in every city and empire he has visited. Even though he has an explosive temper, he possesses a strict sense of criminal honor, often enforced at the business end of his double-barreled shotgun Destiny. In recent years, he has reconciled a troubled partnership with Twisted Fate, and together they have prospered once more in the turmoil of Bilgewater's criminal underbelly.

skins.name: Crime City Graves
skins.description: Cool, calm, and collected, Malcolm Graves is head of the notorious Graves crime family—and the only non-rat that Twitch will trust. Recent moves in the criminal underworld have put his alliance with the rat-men on shaky ground, and he's keen to find out why.

skins.name: Riot Graves
skins.description: A Riot Games skin obtained by either meeting a Rioter or attending an official Riot event in 2012.

skins.name: Cutthroat Graves
skins.description: Do you want to do extreme damage to someone (or something) in a loud, noticeable fashion? Look no further than Graves and his slippery pal Tobias, two men who will blow up anything (must be destructible) or anyone (must be destructible) for the right price (no ghouls please). Inquire within!

skins.name: Snow Day Graves

descriptions.description: Loot exclusive gained from the 2018 Snowdown event.

skins.description: Outfitted with his mighty snowblowing gun and a can-do attitude, Graves enters every snowball fight with the same entrepreneurial spirit that got him out of prison. Which is to say, blowing a lot of things up with little to no regard for his own safety.

skins.name: Victorious Graves

descriptions.description: Ranked reward for achieving Gold in Ranked Flex for Season 7.
Ranked reward for achieving Gold in Ranked Solo for Season 7.
Ranked reward for achieving Gold in Ranked 3v3 for Season 7.

skins.description: Victorious Graves was awarded to players who reached Gold or higher in the 2017 season. The most wanted outlaw in Bilgewater boasts of his years of skillful heists, by wearing the finest regalia money can buy.

skins.name: Praetorian Graves

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

skins.description: Unleashed upon the multiverse by imperfect Pulsefire technology, Graves is but one of a numberless horde of Praetorian marauders now plaguing spacetime. Its programming is unlike anything from any known past, present, or future—each of its thoughts is so complex, it would take ten lifetimes for a human to comprehend.

skins.name: Battle Professor Graves

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2019.
Loot exclusive gained during the 2019 Trials event.

skins.description: Graves is a salty ex-soldier who served in the Durandal military before he reluctantly became a professor. Following his discovery of something deep behind enemy lines, he received an offer to teach at the Academy from the God-Weapon itself. His hallmark cigar-munching, dispassionate teaching etiquette is a small price to pay for his decades of experience.

skins.name: Sentinel Graves

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Sentinel event.

skins.description: Graves could give a damn about saving the world, but the Ruined King is getting in the way of his criminal undertakings, and that he cannot abide. When the Sentinels come calling, Graves reckons he can play the hero for once—long enough to make sure there's a world left to rob, anyway.

skins.name: EDG Graves

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during MSI 2022.

skins.description: Honoring Flandre's winning performance as Graves during the 2021 World Championship.

passive.name: New Destiny
passive.description: Graves' shotgun has some unique properties. He must reload when he runs out of ammo. Attacks fire 4 bullets, which cannot pass through units. Non-champions struck by multiple bullets are knocked back.

spells.name: End of the Line
spells.description: Graves fires an explosive shell that detonates after 2 seconds, or 0.2 seconds if it strikes terrain.
spells.dynamicDescription: Graves fires a powder round dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ physical damage</physicalDamage>. After 1 second or after colliding with terrain, it detonates, dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDetonationDamage@ physical damage</physicalDamage> along the travel path again and to enemies near the blast.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Smoke Screen
spells.description: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke that reduces sight range. Enemies caught in the initial impact are dealt magic damage and have their Move Speed reduced briefly.
spells.dynamicDescription: Graves creates a cloud of black smoke for 4 seconds, <status>Slowing</status> enemies inside by @Effect2Amount@% and blocking their vision outside the area. The initial impact deals <magicDamage>@ImpactDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Quickdraw
spells.description: Graves dashes forward gaining an Armor boost for several seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boost.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Graves dashes and reloads one Shell into his shotgun. He also gains a stack for 4 seconds (max @Effect10Amount@ stacks) or two stacks if he dashes towards an enemy champion. Stacks grant him @Effect5Amount@ Armor. Stacks are refreshed when damaging a non-minion.

Each bullet hit from Graves' Attacks reduces this Ability's Cooldown by @Effect4Amount@ seconds.
@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Collateral Damage
spells.description: Graves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits. After hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes dealing damage in a cone.
spells.dynamicDescription: Graves fires an explosive cartridge, blasting himself backwards. The cartridge deals <physicalDamage>@Damage@ physical damage</physicalDamage> to the first enemy hit. After hitting an enemy champion or reaching the end of its range, the cartridge explodes outward, dealing <physicalDamage>@FalloffDamage@ physical damage</physicalDamage>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
